EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Event_SpringOne2GX2013.SpringOne 2GX 2013 8-22 Email Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Network with the leaders at SpringOne2GX, Sept 9-12 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NETWORK WITH LEADERS AT SPRINGONE 2GX 2013!
Register today <http://springone2gx.com/conference/santa-clara/2013/09/register> to join hundreds of influential developers and network with the leaders of Spring, CloudFoundry, Groovy and Grails <http://www.springone2gx.com/conference/santa_clara/2013/09/2gx/event_speakers>. By clicking those links, you'll see that our speakers are project leaders, authors, professional trainers and recognized industry experts. They are the people writing the software you use on a daily basis, or are people who are applying it to transform their businesses.
This is also your opportunity to network with leaders in the user community across every imaginable industry -- we'll have Birds of a Feather sessions on Tuesday Sept 10th, from 9:00pm to 10:00pm to ensure you get a chance to do so.
Remember that SpringOne 2GX registrants have free access to Platform: The Cloud Foundry Event <http://www.platformcf.com> (September 8-9, 2013). We hope to see you at both conferences!
Final Schedule Published Check our website <http://springone2gx.com/conference/santa_clara/2013/09/home> for the final conference schedule. If you'd like to get a feel for the type of content at the show, watch some of the 2012 conference sessions <https://springone2gx.com/conference/washington/2012/10/video_list> on YouTube!
Conference Overview
This is a one-of-a-kind conference for application developers, solution and data architects who develop business applications, create multi-device aware web applications, process vast quantities of enterprise data, design cloud architectures, and manage high performance infrastructure. The sessions are specifically tailored for developers using the open source Spring, Groovy/Grails, and Cloud Foundry technologies. Whether you're building and running mission-critical business applications, crunching huge piles of distributed data, or designing the next killer cloud application, SpringOne 2GX will keep you up to date with the latest enterprise technology.
Register today <http://springone2gx.com/conference/santa_clara/2013/09/register> and join the leaders circle!
Looking forward to a great conference,
To manage preferences for your Spring related communications, please go to play.gopivotal.com/OSSSubscriptions.html.
